! parse
expectError 'Multiple service structs were found in the same service. Encore only allows one service struct to be defined per service.'
err 'duplicate encore:service directive'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
	"context"
	"encore.dev/types/uuid"
)

//encore:service
type Service struct {}

//encore:service
type Duplicate struct {}

type Params struct{}

//encore:api public
func (s *Service) Str(ctx context.Context, p *Params) error { return nil }
